mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of the cities of Norfolk and Portsmouth: adjoining towns and suburbs / surveyed by J.F. Dezendorf, C.E.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dezendorf, J. F. (John F.) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map on 4 sheets : col. ; each sheet image measures approximately 73 x 53 cm. on sheets 85 x 70 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Explanations for steam rail roads, horse rail roads, water pipes, fire hydrants, fire district boundaries, soundings in feet, street numbers. [original]
"Patrons list and business notices" on left side of map; list of city officials on lower right sheet. [original]
Entered according to Act of Congress A.D. 1876 by F.W. Beers & Co. in the office of the Libraraina of Congress at Washington. [original]
Insets (separate scale): Elizabeth River, Hampton Roads and Chesapeake entrance -- Upper Brambleton. [original]
Inset map (center of both lower sheets): Upper Brambleton (separate scale). [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Has several marginal tears. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Norfolk (Va.)--Maps
Portsmouth (Va.)--Maps
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: New York (City), New York (State), United States
